string-array.name: how_it_spreads
string-array.item: Droplets Through respiratory droplets produced when an infected person coughs or sneezes These droplets can land in the mouth or noses of people who are nearby or possibly inhaled into lungs
Close contact Through close contact with infected person approximately within 2 metres 0 6 feet or 2 to 3 steps. This can be through hugging, kissing, hand shaking or standing close.
Touching contaminated surfaces When we touch objects and surfaces contaminated by corona virus and then touching the mouth , nose or eyes.
